text: Hey there!! I am just making sure I read all of the stuff on the side. How are you this morning?
hello.
Do you donate to any charities?
yes,I like to donate.
Me too!! Have you heard or know about Save the Children foundation?
Yes, but not that much
They are non-governmental which is why I usually tend to go towards them.  They help children in developing countries and get the basic needs met.
Really, that's a great to hear.
I am going to donate part of my payment from this task to them, just a small amount. Would you be willing to donate a small amount as well?
Yes, sure I will also like to donate them.
Ok great!! It looks like it costs .77 a day can shelter a family. I think I will donate .40
I like to donate 0.40. Let's save a family.
Right?! It is not much but if it can do that much for a day for a whole family, its minimal impact even for us slightly struggling.
Yes, You are Right.We can save a family but our donation really help them a little.
For sure!  Where abouts are you from? I currently live in Virginia.
I am from Iowa.
I feel like I probably should donate to some of the locals in the area because there has been an insane increase in the homeless around here. Is it bad in Iowa?
yes, Her many people suffering for their food shelter everything. I have donated  them.
It is awful everywhere. I do the same, I donate what I can and usually try to mentor some of them to try and help them find shelter and jobs.  Some people can be helped for sure!
I felt so bad for all.So, I doing my best for them by small  donation and small things like food,clothes
Same here!! Ok, it looks like we completed our task for this section.  It was nice chatting with you and thank you for donating the .40 to Save the Children with me!! :)
